title: Senior Software Engineer, Apple Services Engineering
summary: Apple is looking for an experienced Software Engineer to develop the next generation of cloud services infrastructure.
description: We are a high-leverage team designing, building, and growing Apple’s foundational privacy-focused platform enabling many of Apple’s signature apps and experiences.
key_qualifications:
- Resourceful: excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
- Collaborative: you excel in a multi-functional organization through clear communication, consistent delivery, and relationship building
- Curious: the desire and ability to independently learn
- Self-directed: the ability to drive a project from a simple idea to production
- User-focused: the user experience and the privacy of data come first
- Leadership: you are able to leverage individual abilities to produce results
education_experience: Bachelor’s Degree in an engineering-related field, or equivalent related experience.
additional_requirements:
- Experience in the below is a plus:
- Languages: Java, Swift, Golang
- Technology: Kubernetes, Cassandra
- Knowledge: Security, Cryptography, Privacy, Virtualization, Networking
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs.
